attributes.action: Compulsory allergy policy for schools  for kids who are at risk of anaphylaxis
attributes.additional_details: Her mental wellbeing is at risk as she has high anxiety not feeling safe at school and is only 6 years old. She also struggles with being left out a lot. Lack of education in schools pose more risk for children who are at risk of anaphylaxis.
attributes.background: My daughter suffers with multiple food allergies and carries JEXT PENS We want to ensure school is a safe place for her, where she can be included in all aspects of school life safely. These allergies are intangible and not always taken seriously and preventative measures need to be put in place.
